hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top
